name: Untitled Grapple Hook Game - Demo
description:
A tech demo from 2015 for a platformer with a grappling hook. Mostly just posting this for completeness's sake.

Since this was just a work-in-progress, there's a lot of debug elements still in the game. As you can see, I didn't quite figure out how to make sloped floors at this time.

Controls:

A, D: Move

W: Jump

Left Click: Use rope

Right Click: Retract rope

ESC: End game
